snippet: After the Ottawa Senators honored longtime former captain Daniel Alfredsson, they were done in by Jaroslav Halak and the surging New York Islanders....

headline.print_headline: Halak Sets Islanders Record With 11th Straight Win
headline.main: Halak Sets Islanders Record With 11th Straight Win

lead_paragraph: After the Ottawa Senators honored longtime former captain Daniel Alfredsson, they were done in by Jaroslav Halak and the surging New York Islanders.
